news.title: Bij dit Antwerps restaurant kan je nu al je kerstmenu bestellen door onzekerheid btw-tarief - Nieuwsblad
news.summary:
# Summary

An Antwerp restaurant is now accepting advance Christmas menu orders due to uncertainty about VAT tax rates. The restaurant is asking customers to book early to help manage pricing and planning amid unclear tax policy changes. Visitors to Antwerp should note this option if planning holiday dining, as early booking may secure better rates or menu availability before potential price adjustments.

While the article doesn't mention a specific restaurant, it highlights that the event will showcase the hospitality sector alongside retail businesses. Visitors to Antwerp would care because this inaugural event offers a fun way to discover and support local dining and shopping venues throughout the downtown area.

Visitors to the city should care because it represents a well-established, beloved local restaurant with over a decade-and-a-half of proven quality and experience.
